channel.title: folk on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in folk on Rusland 1

item.title: Oleg Gazmanov – Forward Russia (Вперёд, Россия!)
item.description: Hackers According to the description of Вперёд, Россия! (Forward Russia), the clip о Величии России, about the greatness of Russia, was removed by hackers. Gazmanov’s website was also hacked. Значит, он кого-то настолько сильно задел, meaning it must have hit someone hard.

item.title: Nadezhda Kadysheva – Wide River
item.description: Sleeper Широка река, глубока река – the river is wide and deep. Не доплыть тебе с того бережка – you can’t swim from that shore. Flying won’t work either. She would do it (Полететь бы мне), but alas, there are no wings (да вот крыльев нет).
